attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I would like to see an end to tax rises. We have had to many tax increase over the last 6 years. I would like to see a tax decrease in our wages.

rejection.details:
There are already lots of petitions on income tax:
http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/search?q=income+tax
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
